item.title: Hey there!
item.description: I’m Steffen, a 20 year old CS Student at TUM. Helping out at Rubean. An old blog of mine can be found here. ‚ú®Skillset Java (Tutor in the courses PGDP & EIDI at TUM WS2020) C & Assembly (x86, SIMD) DirectX, OpenGL, bits of Vulkan GLSL, HLSL Unity Engine C# /.NET shell scripting deeper knowledge of GNU/Linux systems basics of Go & Python ‚ú®Facts my music taste is all over the place yes, i genuinely enjoy low-level programming big fan of computer graphics in a relationship with the best girl on üåç average coffee enjoyer skyrim belongs neither to the nords, nor the imperials love memes and internet culture ‚ú®Hardware Tier List These are my top-notch *cough daily drivers, sorted by use
